# formIndex(before:)

**Instance Method**

Replaces the given index with its predecessor.

## Declaration

```swift
func formIndex(before i: inout LazyMapSequence<Base, Element>.Index)
```

## Parameters

- **i**: A valid index of the collection. `i` must be greater than `startIndex`.
title: formIndex(before:)
